name: Mimpi Volleyball
description:
Help Mimpi play some ball with the most fantastic creatures.
Enjoy distinctive, fantastic graphic of this minigame that is based on award winning Mimpi the game.

Game Features:
Mimpi, the cutest puppy ever. No kidding - check the screenshots!
Get surprised by random combination of 7 fantastic levels, 8 creatures, 7 balls and 7 Mimpis to play with.
Distinctive visual style, as seen in Mimpi the Game.

Important:
This game is not Mimpi the Game!
No further in app purchases required.
Compatible with iPad, iPod touch 4G, iPhone 4 and newer.

More levels coming soon!

Follow us for the latest info and game news!
